This 1971 film follows a team of scientists as they race against time to uncover the source of a deadly contagion that has decimated a small town. With a talented cast and a suspenseful plot, this movie is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

On the other hand, if you're looking for something a bit more unique and quirky, then "Louie" might be the way to go. This 2012 film tells the story of a mysterious man who rides around Boston on a tricycle, yelling a strange noise that has become his signature. Through interviews with local residents and store employees, we learn more about Louie's life as a dedicated bicyclist and a compassionate, misunderstood person. With its quirky plot and lovable characters, "Louie" is sure to charm you.
